claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: David Lance `` Dave '' Arneson  (  October 1 , 1947 -- April 7 , 2009  )  was an American game designer best known for co-developing the first published role-playing game  (  RPG  )  , Dungeons & Dragons , with Gary Gygax , in the early 1970s .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Arneson 's early work was fundamental to the development of the genre , developing the concept of the RPG using devices now considered to be archetypical , such as adventuring in `` dungeons '' , using a neutral judge , who doubles as the voice and consciousness of all other characters to develop the storyline .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Arneson discovered wargaming as a teenager in the 1960s , and began combining these games with the concept of role-playing .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was a University of Minnesota student when he met Gygax at the Gen Con gaming convention in the late 1960s .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1970 Arneson created the game and fictional world that became Blackmoor , writing his own rules and basing the setting on medieval fantasy elements .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Arneson showed the game to Gygax the following year , and the pair co-developed a set of rules that became Dungeons & Dragons  (  D&D  )  .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Gygax subsequently founded TSR , Inc. to publish the game in 1974 .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Arneson worked briefly for the company .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Arneson left TSR in 1976 , and filed suit in 1979 to retain credits and royalties on the game .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He continued to work as an independent game designer , briefly worked for TSR again in the 1980s , and continued to play games for his entire life .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Arneson also did some work in computer programming , and taught computer game design and game rules design at Full Sail University from the 1990s until shortly before his death in 2009 .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Ernest Gary Gygax  (  -LSB- ˈɡaɪɡæks -RSB-  )   (  July 27 , 1938 -- March 4 , 2008  )  was an American game designer and author best known for co-creating with Dave Arneson the pioneering role-playing game Dungeons & Dragons  (  D&D  )  .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Gygax has been described as the father of D&D .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the 1960s , Gygax created an organization of wargaming clubs and founded the Gen Con gaming convention .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1971 , he helped develop Chainmail , a miniatures wargame based on medieval warfare .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He co-founded the company Tactical Studies Rules  (  TSR , Inc.  )  with childhood friend Don Kaye in 1973 .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The following year , he and Arneson created D&D , which expanded on Gygax 's Chainmail and included elements of the fantasy stories he loved as a child .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the same year , he founded The Dragon , a magazine based around the new game .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1977 , Gygax began work on a more comprehensive version of the game , called Advanced Dungeons & Dragons .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Gygax designed numerous manuals for the game system , as well as several pre-packaged adventures called `` modules '' that gave a person running a D&D game  (  the `` Dungeon Master ''  )  a rough script and ideas on how to run a particular gaming scenario .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1983 , he worked to license the D&D product line into the successful D&D cartoon series .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After leaving TSR in 1985 over issues with its new majority owner , Gygax continued to create role-playing game titles independently , beginning with the multi-genre Dangerous Journeys in 1992 .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He designed another gaming system called Lejendary Adventure , released in 1999 .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2005 , Gygax was involved in the Castles & Crusades role-playing game , which was conceived as a hybrid between the third edition of D&D and the original version of the game conceived by Gygax .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Gygax was married twice and had six children .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2004 , Gygax suffered two strokes , narrowly avoided a subsequent heart attack , was then diagnosed with an abdominal aortic aneurysm , and died in March 2008 .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Dungeons & Dragons  (  abbreviated as D&D or DnD  )  is a fantasy tabletop role-playing game  (  RPG  )  originally designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson , and first published in 1974 by Tactical Studies Rules , Inc.  (  TSR  )  .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Ernest Gary Gygax  (  -LSB- ˈɡaɪɡæks -RSB-  )   (  July 27 , 1938 -- March 4 , 2008  )  was an American game designer and author best known for co-creating with Dave Arneson the pioneering role-playing game Dungeons & Dragons  (  D&D  )  .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: When Gary Gygax could not find a publisher for D&D , a new type of game he and Dave Arneson were co-developing , Gygax and Don Kaye founded Tactical Studies Rules in October , 1973 , to self-publish their products .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The first edition was written by J. Eric Holmes based on Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson 's original work .

claim: Dungeons & Dragons was designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.
premise_source_doc_sentence: David Lance `` Dave '' Arneson  (  October 1 , 1947 -- April 7 , 2009  )  was an American game designer best known for co-developing the first published role-playing game  (  RPG  )  , Dungeons & Dragons , with Gary Gygax , in the early 1970s .
